name: jasperreports-scala
short_description:
The Scala programming language is a hybrid functional/object-oriented programming language that runs natively in the Java VM. It is similar in some respects to Groovy, but it is a statically typed language. Visit www.scala-lang.org for more info.

This project adds the JRScalaCompiler and JRScalaGenerator classes, modifies the JRReport class to add Scala as a supported language, and provides a demo project with a sample report that uses Scala expressions.
summary: Adds Scala as an expression language for the JasperReports library
